thing-type.description: Isolated Contact Fixture Module<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtz-Wave Radio Frequency (RF) Controlled, 120 VAC Scene Capable, Isolated Contact Fixture Module</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtPrepare the Controller to include a unit to the network, by adding it to a group (method of adding a node to the network). Refer to Controller instructions.</li&gt <li&gtThe FS20Z-1 must be in its permanently installed location. Press the button on the FS20Z-1 once.</li&gt <li&gtYou should see an indication on your Controller that the “DEVICE WAS INCLUDED” in the network.</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtRemove the module by tapping the button three times, then press and hold.</p&gt
